text:
Have you #GotYourCOVIDShot yet? 
If yes, help researchers learn about its long term effects in #autoimmune diseases. We request both #healthy and patients with any #autoimmune disease to fill out this survey for comparison.

#CoVADstudy #vaccine #COVID19 

https://t.co/ngBSVthWLo https://t.co/nQHgopRWGL
